dialog.text: The top half is filled with sky and the bottom half is river.
Got it, what is the next?
Within the river, there are streaks of water on the right half. These appear mostly at the top of the right half.
Got it, is there any landscape besides water in the river?
Yes, there is a thin line of grass and trees (with the tree on top) along the horizon. It extends from the far right and does not quite reach the far left.
Got it, anything else in the river?
Not in the river, no. Above the trees is a mountain range that goes all the way from left to right.
Got it,  is there anything in the sky if we done for the bottom part
Nothing in the sky but I would like to give more detail about the mountains. The height should be slightly less than one quarter of the height of the image
The placement of the grass and trees is good but could you make the trees shorter?
Is the length of the tree looking good now?
Yes. For the mountains, can you make the top less even? The height is good but the line should dip down in places so that it looks natural
